body:
I made a test VM image from rev 4 of https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/7970/4 and a locally-modified gomote (well, locally modified dashboard/builders.go using my temporary testing VM image name) but it fails when running go/src/nacltest.bash with:

```

testing.(*M).Run(0x1093a120, 0x7738c0, 0x4, 0x4)
```
